subject: Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Trey Freeman banked in a running 3-pointer at the buzzer to lift host Old Dominion to a 72-69 victory over Murray State in the N.I.T. quarterfinals.
snippet: Trey Freeman banked in a running 3-pointer at the buzzer to lift host Old Dominion to a 72-69 victory over Murray State in the N.I.T. quarterfinals.
